creative_variations.headline: Real Women, Real Comfort
creative_variations.message: Discover the secret to all-day comfort with our Studio Spo-ts collection. Join the thousands of women who've already made the switch!
creative_variations.rationale: Using social proof and customer testimonials to re-engage users and drive clicks

creative_variations.headline: The Comfort Difference
creative_variations.message: See the difference our Studio Spo-ts collection can make in your daily life. From lounging to running errands, our undergarments have got you covered!
creative_variations.rationale: Showcasing the product benefits and features through video to educate and engage users

creative_variations.headline: Spo-ts for Every Occasion
creative_variations.message: Whether you're hitting the gym or just lounging around, our Studio Spo-ts collection has the perfect undergarments for you. Browse our collection now!
creative_variations.rationale: Using carousel format to showcase variety and drive engagement

testing_strategy: Launch all 3 variations simultaneously, $20/day each, rotate every 7 days

creative_variations.headline: The Science of Comfort

testing_strategy: Launch all 3 variations simultaneously, $30/day each, rotate every 10 days
